artist: Designer: Auguste Adolphe Willms; Designer: Léonard Morel Ladeuil (border); Manufacturer: Elkington and Co.
creditline: Gift of various donors, by exchange
inscription:
Date, Inscription and Marks
Several illegible, lightly-incised inscriptions on back, top 1/3 of plaque
markings:
LRQ, engraved: [AW];
Bottom center, stamped: 2 illegible small stamps, [F], [E], [(anchor)] and [a]
title: Pompeiian Lady plaque
